column3: â€œBlueberry Cheesecake... This purely-based sativa high gets puts me in a euphoric, uplifted, happy mood for an approximately an hour and a half. This strain takes at least 10 to 15 minutes to hit you, so do not be alarmed as I was, and think that it is a bad strain; it is quite the contrary. It's deffinitely a creeper! Good strain, probably an 8.5 in my opinion.â€
â€œA really mellow, good-mood bud. Goes perfectly alongside rain Forrest incense and The Doors' first album - good laughs to be had with this weed also!â€
â€œEuphoric and energetic, a great daytime strainâ€

â€œBlueberry Cheesecake Connoisseur Review

This remarkable strain does not fail to impress. Immediately upon catching its subtle scent I was taken aback by the sheer fragrant beauty that flowed into my quivering nostrils. I was instantly overwhelmed by an overpowering sense of euphoric bliss. A catching body of pungent skunk with noticeable undertones of citrus complemented by a tart blueberry relish. Its cheese geneti...â€

â€œMy favorite tasting and smelling sativa dominant strain. Not quite as strong as ledit sour d, girl scout cookies, but damn close. It smells exectly like a blueberry cheese danish. Neone who enjoys sativas and enjoys super tasty and incredible smelling medicine this is a must have. If I grew, it would be this and pure kush on the indica side.â€

â€œI was really surprised at this strain. I thought it was a bad strain until it hit me like a train. The wait before the initial hit was about 10-15 minutes. But once it hits, you will definitely like it. Pure sativa dominant. Cerebral effects that are out of this world.â€

â€œThis is one of my favorite strains, solely because it LITERALLY tastes like a blueberry cheesecake. It gave me a lot of energy - in both the creative and active sense - and also made me extremely hungry and giggly. Perfect strain for a night in, but you might not want to smoke too much if you plan on going out in public...it's pretty damn strong!â€

â€œNice buds not to frosty on the outside but when you break them up you uncover tons of cyrstals.  It has a slight blueberry smell to it but more of a cheesecake like smell. .Super smooth smoke that brings a chill high...â€

â€œGreat, great uplifting high, with a wonderful mellow cheesecake taste. It's absolutely delicious. This stuff will not let you sit down. this is the anti-couch lock.  take a hit and go for a walk kind of high.â€

â€œthis one is an indica mindfuck. theres only a few strains that give me hallucinatory experiences but this is one.  the lights in a room got shut off during the night and my first thought was that the power went out. gave me a bit if disoriented confusion and everything became trippy feeling, but in a good way. its a creeper for sure. tastes like blueberry cheesy creamy goodnessâ€

â€œI had this recommended to me by a superior budtender who, it seems, knows exactly what I need for any of my major medical issues. After explaining my most recent symptoms, she recommend the BEAUTIFUL, Blueberry Cheesecake itâ€™s magnificent. The smell is to die for and, the buds are so dense and sugary. The taste is smooth and mellow. Itâ€™s aroma of the smoke just makes you warm and happy. I noticed a sweet and tangy fl...â€
â€œSmooth smoke. Smells like heaven. Cuddly high. General  sense of euphoria. Easy sleep.â€

â€œVape temp 352f using a crafty 

First off, the scent on this is delicious, equal sweet blueberry and cheese. It tastes as nice as it smells; sweet, blueberries and cheese. 

Gave me a very relaxed feeling. I was left talkative, social and interactive. It would be a great strain for social anxiety. 

Nothing bad to say, a second vape only added to the giggles.â€
â€œREALLY helps me feel hungry (I don't eat much due to other meds), and also helps w/ sleep! Awesome AND yummy!â€
â€œDeliciously tasty! Blueberry cheesy goodness! Smells absolutely amazing but the staste comes through with a little funky cheesiness!â€
â€œAfter a full day of activities this strain had me so relaxed within  minutes. My husband had to move me to bedğŸ˜ but it was the best sleep I had in months.â€

â€œFor a semi-beginner like myself, who smoked less than 50 g over fiften years, I have to say it takes far less than a ten minutes for this to kick. Five minute in, and I'm pretty floatey. Only half a pipe. Recommend.

Ten minute marker. Uppgrading this from a four to a to a five.â€

â€œStrain: Berry White
Type: Indica

Smell: Faintly floral

Taste: Very feint sweetness (probably because of oil form)

Method: Vape Cartridge

Dosage: 4 Second drag causes a moderate high. 8 Second drag causes potent high. Small puffs do not affect.

Properties: Smily, creative, focused, slightly lazy but still active.

Negatives: Extreme sleepiness once it wears off. Too much can cause one to be unfocused.

Afterglow:...â€

â€œ1st choice. As a heavy user I only use concentrates as my method of delivery, I have tried many strains, and Blueberry Cheesecake is a well thought out personal number one. Following the blueberry strain for its notably smooth feel, this version stands above in that quality. Blueberry cheesecake is the best strain for feel, from small samples to some of the largest doses.â€

â€œnice  smell-  taste good out potato pipe.

â€œBig fan of this strand, great head high, really mellow vibe with a pretty good taste. still able to focus and go out in public. haha that's a huge plusâ€

â€œGood hybrid indica dominate high. Indica is dominate in this strain. A bit of dry mouth and eyes with a hint of paranoia (just a tiny bit). Super relaxing while motivating me to be a little productive (I feel like doing something). I need to gain weight and blueberry cheesecake makes me hungry.â€

â€œThis stuff absolutely reeks of sweet blueberry and pungent cheese. The high totally messed me right up. Hard to speak properly, dizzying full body high with some cerebral stimulation. I think in some cases this would be effective medically, however for myself the incapacitating high seems more suitable for recreational useâ€

â€œBlueberry cheesecake is a great strain for putting  mind and body at ease. it relieved most of my pain from my migraine almost instantly  after finishing  a bowl. So I smoked another bowl and my pain was gone and so were my worries. The taste is fruit on inhale and cheese on exhale.â€

â€œSolstice Grown's Blueberry Cheesecake is ubiquitous in the Seattle area. I am happy I finally tried it. The smell and flavor are appetizing. The effects are indica leaning relaxing but not overwhelmingly heavy. This is an early stress buster with ample pain relief, followed by good sleep support. I consume(d) lightly and can't speak to how it will treat one at heavier doses.â€

Afterglow: Slight hazy feeling, very clear feeling in low dosage, slight pressure on head.â€

â€œSmells great, kind of harsh smoke, good for de-stressing, and some pain relief. Helped me sleep, but tough to wake up the next day. probably great for a stay-cation. For me, it's a 3.5, not the perfect medicine for me.â€

â€œlove the cheeses and this is no exception.nice sticky buds and very cheesy smelling w/ a little berry in it,same as the taste.good all round anytime smoke which to me is the best.will give u the munchies and i love it f/ my wake and bake of course.always a good choice.â€

â€œExcellent strain. Beautiful tight buds and very colorful and crystally if that's a word. I feel relaxed and I could just chill but not the type where I don't feel like getting up and doing something that is needed.â€

â€œMakes me feel spacey, floaty, heavy,happy and exercised.. Strong coffee,blueberry,sweet flavors and a smooth smoke with a heavy throat hit.â€

â€œThis strain is probably a 3.8 in my book. A delicious Knotts berry farm type Blueberry pie smell. Not a very smooth smoke, but it wasn't trimmed well...straight forward stoney feeling. a little spacey and happy. Feeling about couch locked, but happy to watch tv, except the commercials. ..kinda feel itchy as wellâ€

â€œBest smelling, tasting herb imo. The satva high is only topped by top shelf sativas such as sour d, gsc, or cali mist. I cant say enough about the smell. Omg... its unbelievably accurate smell based on the name.â€

â€œHit the Solo vape with this strain. Took a good 5-8 hits and it's a creeper. Euphoria made my head feel heavy but not in a totally incapacitated kinda way but more in a happy, hazzy way. This strain will also make you forget what you were talking to while in conversation lol! Overall a pleasant high with an easy comedown.â€

â€œA very nice indica that relaxes your body. It smells and tastes great! Unfortunately, this strain gave me bad anxiety. I wouldn't recommend it for people who have anxiety problems after smoking certain strains.â€

â€œInitially, the taste and smoke of this strain were incredible.  Then the onsetting high began and I wasn't thrilled with the results.  Overall, if done in lighter dosages, it was a pleasant stress relieving strain, with some mild to strong psychedelic effect.  However, if over done, I found it to produce anxiety based effects, including panic attacks.

Overall, was a great stress reliever, but the negatives I receive...â€
â€œTHE DENCE BUDS GIVES ME INTANT RELIEF THANK YOU JAZZ CLUBâ€

column1: First bowl gave me a nice lift and an ease in migraine pain.

yep I was on a roll / bowl.
and watch out for the munchies.â€"

column3: â€œThis strain is a pretty good strain. It has great taste, great smell, and good vibes. I would say to those who smoke weed for anxiety; this strain made my anxiety go up a little more than normal, but only if I was triggered by something. Other than that, I love it :)â€
